name: Comboat
description:
A submission to the GMTK 2021 Gamejam and a homage to combat.

The campaign is a tutorial level for a puzzle like game where the enemy's movements are joined together to the player's movements. In the tutorial level, the enemy's movements are identical to the players. In a full version, there will be more enemy types where their movements will mirror the player's.

There is also a local versus mode where you can join together in order figuratively tear each other apart in battle. each player's inputs do not influence the other's character.

Both game modes allow a choice between playing as a larger,  aesthetically pleasing boat, or a smaller, more maneuverable tank.
